Room.Name: Cliff Tor
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a high and rocky point at the west end of Lelion Beach and Park.
Room.LongDescription: You are on top of a peninsula which extends into the Nylandian Bay to the west. There is a lighthouse on the high point in that direction. The city of Oceancrest hires weather wizards to maintain the climate, but just to be safe, they also maintain a brilliant, magical light out there to warn ships and help them locate themselves when the fog rolls in.
